title: Notify Guest Their Table is Ready
description: A table becomes available for a party on the restaurant's waitlist.

tasks.description: The host marks the table as 'Ready' in the reservation system.
The system automatically sends an SMS notification to the next party on the waitlist.
tasks.expected_outcome: The guest receives a text message that their table is ready.

tasks.description: The host removes the party from the waitlist and assigns them to the table.
tasks.expected_outcome: The party is seated, and the system is updated.
